aboutMeTitle: Hi I’m Alex Web developer and Stage designer!
aboutMePhrase: As a recent graduate in Web Development, I'm passionate about creating impactful, user-centered websites and applications. I have developed a solid foundation in back-end and front-end technologies throughout my studies. My internship has allowed me to explore some of the development lifecycle, and I am eager to bring my skills and creativity to a dynamic team and continue growing as a developer.
